thread.title: Scott Disick Photographed Outside Rehab Center in Malibu
thread.title_full: Scott Disick Photographed Outside Rehab Center in Malibu

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Scott Disick Photographed Outside Rehab Center in Malibu
text:
Comments Sporting casual style, the father of three looked down while walking outside the drug rehabilitation center in Malibu on Thursday, October 15. 
Scott Disick has started treatment for addiction at a drug rehabilitation center in Malibu. The former " Keeping Up with the Kardashians " star was photographed outside the rehab center on Thursday, October 15. The father of three looked casual in the photograph. Scott wore gray T-shirt topped with black jacket. He parted his hair sideway while sporting scruffy beard. He looked down while walking outside the rehab center. According to Entertainment Tonight, Scott checked into the rehab center on Wednesday. Earlier this week, Scott took to Instagram to share a photo of cryptic note which read, "Never Give Up." The words were written in pink and white chalks on a blackboard. He didn't write any caption alongside the photo. Foto kiriman Scott Disick (@letthelordbewithyou) pada Okt 12, 2015 pada 4:50 PDT It wasn't the first time Scott was seeking treatment for addiction. Back in March, Scott briefly checked into a Costa Rica rehab for hallucinogenic treatment. He then checked into a Florida facility in July. While Scott was busy with his treatment, her ex-partner Kourtney Kardashian was in Las Vegas to visit Lamar Odom . Lamar was found unconscious with "mucus-type liquid coming out of his nose and mouth" at a brothel in Nevada on Tuesday. Doctors claimed to have found " cocaine and opiates " in his system. According to source at the brothel, the former NBA star consumed 10 sex pills over the course of 3 days before he was found unconscious.
